attributes.action: stop the sale of TVs, DVD players, stereos etc which have a "stand by" feature
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The "stand by" feature allows electronic equipment to use large amounts of energy while they are not in use.  This in turn leads to higher carbon emissions.  If the sale were banned from some suitable future date then manufacturers would be able to replace non-compliant products within their range through their normal product replacement cycle while ensuring a reduction of carbon emissions in the long term.
